items.name: Chocolate Cream Cold Brew
items.description: A cold start never tasted so good. Foamed milk, espresso, and you're on your way to a refreshingly cool beverage that you can enjoy any time of day.

items.name: Espresso
items.description: Every espresso beverage we handcraft for you, started right here. The quest began in 1975 with a search for the perfect melding of beans and roast, ending months of intense experimentation with the coffee you’re holding in your hand. A recipe for caramelly sweetness – so right that it's never been changed.

items.name: Flat White
items.description: Take that first sip, and enjoy. A delicious spiced coffee, and you made it yourself. Look at you go. You can also sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on top, if you’re feeling extra fancy.

items.name: Caffè Americano
items.description: Sip it slowly, and savour the flavour.Simple, and delicious  just the way coffee should be.

items.name: Caramel Macchiato
items.description: It’s a lightly roasted blonde coffee, but it's full of flavour. Add some frothed milk and you've got yourself one delicious macchiato.

items.name: Caffè Mocha
items.description: Take that first sip, and enjoy. The Caffé Mocha you know and love, and you've just perfected it. Nice.
